explanation: [0-0] Three friends in basketball jerseys are in a living room. All three have excited expressions on their faces and simultaneously raise their hands in the air. The girl in the middle is wearing a blue Golden State Warriors jersey, the boy on the left is wearing a red Chicago Bulls jersey, and the boy on the right is wearing a green Milwaukee Bucks jersey.
